pr_title: Fix annotation scanning argument object types

timeline.author: coderbot16

timeline.bodyText: I know it isn't strictly part of this PR, but the official name for these is elements. In other words, argMethods -> elements seems like a good name change.
timeline.author: coderbot16
coderbot16

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            				String memberName, Map<String, Object> annotationData
          
          
            
            				String memberName, Map<String, Object> elements

coderbot16

timeline.bodyText: The methods that are just used for the ASM annotation scanning code can be pruned, since they're probably not needed otherwise.
